NOT FOR CHARITY, BUT FOR A CHANGE
An initiative by Enactus (KIIT-KISS)
Is your car too grubby for a drive? Are you dreaded to think about taking your car to the over-expensive car wash? Don't want to spend your entire day at the car wash waiting for your vehicle to shine like it's just out of the showroom? Then this is exactly what you need! Take this opportunity to get car-wash services at your doorstep and at the same time be a part of a ''CHANGE''
-->We only employ people with challenged speech and hearing. This is a step towards giving them a better life by enabling them to break the norms of the present day employment scenario and prove themselves.
-->An environment-friendly approach to provide complete cleaning with comparatively less amount of water.
-->Minimal expenses and special price for KIIT students.
COME JOIN THE CHANGE
